pages.text: Speed is always of the essence - the quicker a witch reaches her destination, the sooner she can return home to attend to her matters or find some respite. Whether it be traversing vast distances, hurrying to a merchant, or reaching the swamps before dawn, the Swiftness ritual is invaluable. As with the Empowering ritual, there are two variations of this rite, differing in the potency of the effect and the number of players it can enchant.
